thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 25 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Chipotle Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $2.13

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chipotle Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $2.13
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc:
* CHIPOTLE FIRST QUARTER EARNINGS PER SHARE INCREASES 33% TO $2.13 ON REVENUE INCREASE OF 7.4%
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.13 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.57 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE $1.1 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.15 BILLION
* QTRLY COMPARABLE RESTAURANT SALES INCREASED 2.2% * QTRLY FOOD COSTS WERE 32.4% OF REVENUE, A DECREASE OF 140 BASIS POINTS AS COMPARED TO Q1 OF 2017
* SEES 2018 COMPARABLE RESTAURANT SALES INCREASES IN LOW-SINGLE DIGITS
* QTRLY RESTAURANT LEVEL OPERATING MARGIN WAS 19.5% IN Q1 OF 2018, A 180 BASIS POINT IMPROVEMENT FROM 17.7% IN Q1 OF 2017
* BOARD HAS APPROVED INVESTMENT OF UP TO AN ADDITIONAL $100 MILLION, EXCLUSIVE OF COMMISSIONS
* SEES 130 TO 150 NEW RESTAURANT OPENINGS IN FY 2018 * APPROVED INVESTMENT OF UP TO AN ADDITIONAL $100 MILLION, EXCLUSIVE OF COMMISSIONS, TO REPURCHASE SHARES OF COMMON STOCK Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
